name: quell
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to stop something, especially by using force: Police in riot gear were called in to quell the disturbances/unrest. This latest setback will have done nothing to quell the growing doubts about the future of the club.

to completely stop or end something: The police were called in to quell the riot.
If you quell doubts, fears, etc., you calm them: He’s been unable to quell his wife’s suspicions.
